Articles.Content:
7/29/14 - UPDATED VERSION OF MODULEMANAGER PACKAGED IN ZIP, UPDATED .CFG FILES FOR 0.24. NO OTHER CHANGES.

6/1/14 - OKAY APPARENTLY SPACEPORT IS DEAD NOW. RELOCATED TO CURSE. NO OTHER CHANGES TO MOD AT THIS TIME

10/18/13 - UPDATED FOR COMPATIBILITY WITH 0.22

Hey, you know this cockpit?

It's got windows and instruments now

Like TouhouTorpedo's Mk3 internal mod, this doesn't break compatibility with any of your savegame or craft files; nothing is changed or overwritten except the "INTERNAL { name = yaddayaddayadda }" line in the cockpits part.cfg.

Get it here:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220927-mk2-cockpit-internals

License:CC 3.0 Share Alike with attribution

Edited July 30, 2014 by Sam Hall
i think the profanity filter had a problem with the word "cockpit" or something
You just made my dream. Thank you.

Thanks for creating this awesome cockpit.

No grey walls anymore!
This is great! Nice work!
Been waiting for this ever since my crushing disappointment over the barely-implemented vanilla IVAs many updates ago. With this and TouhouTorpedo's Mk. 3 cockpit, planes are viable in IVA-only view!
No sticky notes? Please, consider adding at least one

Nice IVA!

The current cockpits in KSP are just jokes (placeholders),kerbals dont even fit in it lol.

Here some "realistic" cockpit: (enough room for one kerbal+props)
Yes yes yes yes yes! Thank you so much for making this!
Beautiful! Good finally have an IVA for this.
Allelujah!
Do my eyes deceive me, or is this an IVA that actually has a usable view outside!? And an instrument panel layout that makes sense! What is this madness?
How did you get the IVA shots of the kerbal?

Thanks for the internals! I just figured out how to get the Mk3 IVA to work with B9's Mk 5 cockpit and between the two, I'm very happy! Every capsule and command pod needs a good IVA.

Edited August 2, 2013 by HeadHunter67

My 0.02 kerbal monetary units:

If you're using the Module Manager plugin (like, for FAR) you can, instead of overwriting Squad's config file for Mk2 cockpit, patch this internal in by creating a part-patch.cfg file anywhere you like within GameData containing this:


@PART[Mark2Cockpit]
{

	@INTERNAL
	{
		@name = SH_mk2CockpitInternal
	}
}

YES !!!! Finally ! FANTASTIC ! Great work ! and mostly THANKS A LOT !!!!!!!!!!!!!

(I'm a huge cockpit view fan, unfortunately i'm also a big MK2 fan, always had great problems in deciding cockpit when making space or regular planes. You have solved this !)

Dude, I have only one thing to say:

THIS COCKPIT IS EPIC!

That is all.

...

Oh, and this should be default for that cockpit. It looks stock!

Nice IVA!

The current cockpits in KSP are just jokes (placeholders),kerbals dont even fit in it lol.

Here some "realistic" cockpit: (enough room for one kerbal+props)

Where is that modded cockpit from? Do you have a download link?
I've been waiting for this day. I always use the Mk2. Great work.
Beautiful cockpit design! I love having iva only capabilities!
Thank you so much for this
Was hoping one like this would be made, thanks!
You can actually see enough outside to be useful - it'll never catch on
Thanks for this one. I like to use this cockpit, since you can attach a docking port to the front. Now my manned tugs will be even more fun.
Ahh... What a joy, thank you very much!
thanks you based sam
